question_stem: A company has two factories X and Y. Factories X and Y produce 40% and 60% of all watches respectively. 2% of the watches produced by factory X are defective, and 3% of the watches produced by factory Y are defective. If a watch bought from the company is found to be defective, what is the probability that it was produced by factory Y?
